mapper.insert: insert into db_productwyt (SID, 'NAME', MWAREHOUSEID, QTYONHAND, QTYORDERED, QTYAVAILABLE, QTYSELL, SPECIFICATION) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mwarehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qtyonhand,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qtyordered,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qtyavailable,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qtysell,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{specification,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_productwyt set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MWAREHOUSEID = #{mwarehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTYONHAND = #{qtyonhand,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QTYORDERED = #{qtyordered,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QTYAVAILABLE = #{qtyavailable,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QTYSELL = #{qtysell,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPECIFICATION = #{specification,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, 'NAME', MWAREHOUSEID, QTYONHAND, QTYORDERED, QTYAVAILABLE, QTYSELL, SPECIFICATION from db_productwyt
